metadata.title: CVE-2023-28362 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: The redirect_to method in Rails allows provided values to containcharacters which are not legal in an HTTP header value. This results in thepotential for downstream services which enforce RFC compliance on HTTPresponse headers to remove the assigned Location header.

criterions.comment: rails package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
